mapper.select: SELECT c.category_name, i.item_name, i.item_option, i.item_price, i.item_image, i.item_info, i.item_count FROM items as i INNER JOIN category as c ON c.id = i.category WHERE i.admin_id = #{adminId};
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET item_count = #{itemCount} WHERE id = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT id FROM items WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND item_name = #{itemName} AND item_option = #{itemOption} limit 1) as s)
